Html:
Hello, I need some help to optimize my bear tank.

What option should I choose in "Calculation to optimize"? Survival, mitigation, thread  rating?

I have different result (spiecially on gems).

It seems that stacking stamina with solid ocean sapphire is no longer the best choise and I'm a little bit confused, I thought that stamina was always the bear's best friend.

Thank you
Overall. And make sure you have a good Survival Soft Cap specified in the options, so that you can get accurate results.
Where can I find this option on the last Rawr version?...Not below Opitons>edit Option
It's on the Options tab, not the menu.
